body.p: As set out in paragraph BC5.318 of the Basis for Conclusions on IFRS 9, the Board considered that changes might be made to a financial asset or a financial liability, or to the formal designation of a hedging relationship, in addition to those changes required by the reform. The effect of such additional changes to the formal hedge designation on the application of the hedge accounting requirements would depend on whether those changes result in the derecognition of the underlying financial instrument (see paragraph 5.4.9 of IFRS 9).
